subject: We are all Daimyo
msgSnippet: Rice costs about $3.50 a koku in bulk! (50 cents a bushel) If you make $35K a year, you make 10,000 koku. Scale as appropriate to your salary ;) Jim one room

$35K a year, you make 10,000 koku. Scale as appropriate to your salary ;)
